#
# WWWOFFLE Version 2.7 - robots exclusion file.
#
# See: http://info.webcrawler.com/mak/projects/robots/norobots.html
#

User-Agent: *

# The control pages
Disallow: /control

# The configuration pages
Disallow: /configuration

# The refresh forms
Disallow: /refresh

# The monitor forms
Disallow: /monitor

# The indexes
Disallow: /index
